long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use the "Proxy URL" to unlock Medium articles.

How to use?
1. Install the extension
2. Pin the extension
3. Open the Medium article you want to read
5. Click the extension icon

What is the "Proxy URL"?
You can use this kind of URL (https://Proxy URL/Medium Article URL) to read membership articles for free.

FAQ
If it's not working, reinstall the extension.
